snippet: Donald Trump’s attack on a Hispanic-American federal judge was “the textbook definition of a racist comment,” Mr. Ryan said.
abstract: House Speaker Paul D Ryan calls Donald Trump's comments about Mexican-American Judge Gonzalo P Curiel 'racist,' reigniting alarm over direction of Republican Party and whether prominent Republicans should support Trump; despite rebuke, Ryan says he will still back Trump; many Republican incumbents face fraught decision over whether to embrace or reject Trump, and risk alienating his base.

byline.original: By JENNIFER STEINHAUER, JONATHAN MARTIN and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN

lead_paragraph: Donald Trump’s attack on a Hispanic-American federal judge was “the textbook definition of a racist comment,” Mr. Ryan said.

headline.main: Paul Ryan Calls Donald Trump’s Attack on Judge ‘Racist,’ but Still Backs Him
headline.print_headline: Ryan Calls Trump’s Comments ‘Racist,’ and Party Alarm Grows
